title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over several years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: Inception
description: A thief with the ability to enter dreams and steal secrets must plant an idea into a target's mind.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster, and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who plunges Gotham into chaos.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The story of a man with a low IQ who achieves great things in life, from sports to war to love.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker and a soap salesman form an underground fight club that evolves into something more.

title: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers a mysterious group that reveals the truth about his reality.

title: Gladiator
description: A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge against the emperor who murdered his family.

title: Titanic
description: A young couple falls in love aboard the ill-fated RMS Titanic.

title: Schindler's List
description: A German industrialist saves Jews from the Holocaust by employing them in his factories.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A hobbit embarks on a quest to destroy a powerful ring.

title: Star Wars: A New Hope
description: A young farmer joins a rebellion to destroy an evil empire's superweapon.

title: Jurassic Park
description: Scientists bring dinosaurs back to life, but chaos ensues when they escape.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: An FBI trainee seeks the help of a brilliant but dangerous cannibal to catch a serial killer.

title: Avatar
description: A marine on an alien planet becomes torn between his mission and the indigenous people.

title: The Avengers
description: Superheroes team up to save Earth from an alien invasion.

title: Good Will Hunting
description: A janitor with a genius-level intellect forms a bond with his therapist.

title: The Departed
description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police try to identify each other.

title: La La Land
description: A musician and an actress chase their dreams in Los Angeles while falling in love.

title: Interstellar
description: Astronauts travel through a wormhole to find a new home for humanity.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
description: The rise and fall of a stockbroker who indulges in excess and corruption.

title: Django Unchained
description: A freed slave teams up with a bounty hunter to rescue his wife.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
description: A concierge and his lobby boy embark on a zany adventure after a theft.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a drifter and a rebel fight for survival.

title: Whiplash
description: A young drummer faces a ruthless music instructor in pursuit of greatness.

title: The Social Network
description: The founding of Facebook and the legal battles that followed.

title: Blade Runner 2049
description: A replicant hunter uncovers a secret that threatens society.

title: Get Out
description: A Black man uncovers disturbing secrets when meeting his white girlfriend's family.

title: Parasite
description: A poor family infiltrates the lives of a wealthy household, with shocking consequences.

title: Knives Out
description: A detective investigates the mysterious death of a wealthy patriarch.
Two soldiers undertake a dangerous mission during World War I.

title: Jojo Rabbit
description: A boy’s imaginary friend, Adolf Hitler, guides him through Nazi Germany.

title: Dune
description: A noble family fights for control of a desert planet and its valuable resource.

title: The Shape of Water
description: A mute woman forms a bond with a mysterious aquatic creature.

title: Moonlight
description: A young Black man grapples with his identity and sexuality in Miami.

title: Her
description: A lonely writer falls in love with an AI operating system.

title: No Country for Old Men
description: A hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and faces a relentless hitman.

title: The Big Lebowski
description: A slacker known as 'The Dude' gets caught up in a kidnapping scheme.

title: Spirited Away
description: A young girl navigates a magical world to save her parents.

title: Amélie
description: A shy waitress decides to change the lives of those around her for the better.

title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
description: A couple undergoes a procedure to erase each other from their memories.

title: Memento
description: A man with short-term memory loss searches for his wife’s killer.

title: Drive
description: A stunt driver moonlighting as a getaway driver gets entangled in crime.

title: The Prestige
description: Two magicians become obsessed with outdoing each other in a deadly rivalry.

title: There Will Be Blood
description: A ruthless oilman’s rise to power comes at a personal cost.

title: Oldboy
description: A man seeks revenge after being mysteriously imprisoned for 15 years.

title: The Incredibles
description: A family of superheroes comes out of retirement to save the world.

title: Coco
description: A boy journeys to the Land of the Dead to uncover his family’s secrets.

title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
description: A woman navigates multiple universes to save reality.
